Downloads.w88iOSMessage:
5 Easy Steps to download and play CLUB W88 on iOS Device

  1. Click on the "DOWNLOAD NOW" button below.
  2. All you have to do is click the “Install” button after you start the download and it will automatically install in the background.
  3. Go to SETTINGS => GENERAL => PROFILES & DEVICE MANAGEMENT
  4. Click on “XingLong Country KangXing Environmental Protection Co.,Ltd.” => Click Trust
  5. You are all set and CLUB W88 can be played on your iOS device.
